actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint Commander Thurman Roddy Schnitz, United States Navy Reserves retired, to the rank of captain on the Reserves list.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to appoint Commander Thurman Roddy Schnitz, United States Navy Reserves retired, to the rank of captain on the Reserves list.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint Commander Thurman Roddy Schnitz, United States Navy Reserves retired, to the rank of captain on the Reserves list.
